anya-e0806n5:2_5: kasmiṁ atthe carati khasā vidhīyanticcāha- ‘atthantarassā niddesā’iccādi.
anya-e0806n5:2_10: Titikkhakiriyattāti iminā paresaṁ viya khādyantānaṁ dhātusaññāvidhāna manatthakanti dasseti.
anya-e0806n5:3_0: Titikkhā khamā, titikkhati khamati, vīmaṁsā upaparikkhā,
anya-e0806n5:3_3: Niccaṇyantassa curādikassa hi tādise payojane sati bahulaṁ vidhīyamānepi niccattamattano nātivattati.
anya-e0806n5:3_5: taṁ yathā ‘gāvassa dutiyenāttho’ti. Vuttegoyevopādīyate, nāsso, na gadrabho.
anya-e0806n5:3_6: Kadāci pana assādinopi dutiyassa gahaṇaṁ siyā atthappakaraṇā dippabhāvato.
anya-e0806n5:4_0: Nanu ca vīmaṁsāyaṁ sappaccayavidhāna manupapannamitaretaranissayadosa duṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n5:4_2: sati ca tasmiṁ vīmaṁsāti rūpaṁ sampajjatīti itaretaranissayo,
anya-e0806n5:4_3: itaretara nissayāni ca kāriyānī nopakappantīti tenāha- ‘anuvādarūpāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n5:6_0: Pubbeviya pakativisesanādītyanena ‘‘sambandhassa purisāyattattā ‘tikicchāsaṁsayesū’ti pakativisesananti āha- ‘tikicchāya’miccādi’tyādikaṁ sabbaṁ yathāyogametthāpi vattabbantyatidisati. Vissatthoti visaddassa attho.
anya-e0806n5:6_1: Atha kimitthaṁ chappaccayantasseva dvidhodāharaṇantyāsaṅkiyāha- ‘atthabhedā dvidhodāharaṇa’nti. Niketo nivāso, saṅketo lakkhaṇaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:8_0: Ninda=garahāyaṁ tato ‘‘itthiyamaṇattikayakyā ce’’ti (5-49) appaccaye tato ‘‘itthiyamatvā’’ti (3-26) āppaccaye rūpaṁ. Bandhatīti badhako.
anya-e0806n5:10_1: Tato ceti yato tuṁsmāti paccayasseva gahaṇaṁ yato ca visesana niddeso, tatoti attho.
anya-e0806n5:10_2: Paccayaggahaṇe tadādiggahaṇaṁ viññāyate… ‘‘paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino gahaṇa’’nti ñāyato.
anya-e0806n5:10_3: Visesanattena vattumicchitattā tadantaggahaṇaṁ… ‘‘vidhibbisesanantassā’’ti (1-13) vacanābhi manasi nidhāyāha- ‘yato kiriyatthā’iccādi.
anya-e0806n5:10_4: So kiriyattho ādi yassa samudāyassa so tadādi so paccayonte tassa (so tadanto).
anya-e0806n5:10_7: Nanu ca tuṁsmāiti visesanattena vattumicchite bhavatu ‘‘vidhibbisesanantasse’’ti tadantaggahaṇaṁ paccayaggahaṇe tu kathaṁ tadādino gahaṇaṁ vacanābhāvatoccāha- ‘tadavinābhāvittā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:10_8: Yato vihito tena vinā na bhavati sīleneti tadavinābhāvī tassa bhāvo tasmā.
anya-e0806n5:10_10: yamākhyāyate ‘paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino gahaṇa’nti.
anya-e0806n5:11_1: Kha cha suppattābhāvāti kha cha sānaṁ uppattiyā abhāvā.
anya-e0806n5:11_2: Vuttappakārasseva tuṁppaccayantassa pakatibhāvena gahaṇā sapādito kha cha sānamanuppattīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n5:11_4: nemittike ekāre nivatte ‘jisa jisa iti dvitte anādibyañjanalopo ‘‘jiharānaṁ gī’’ti (5-102) gī.
anya-e0806n5:11_6: ‘‘Ā ī ū mhā ssā ssamhānaṁ vā’’ti (6-33) īssa rasse byajigīsi.
anya-e0806n5:11_7: Yadi tu sapādito sassa uppatti siyā,
anya-e0806n5:11_8: tadā byajigīsīti ettha dvibbacanaṁ karīyamānaṁ sappaccayantassa paṭhamassekassarassa dvibbacanaṁ bhavatīti ‘‘kha cha sāna’’miccādinā (5-69) vijiya iti samudāye ādibhūtassa visaddassa siyā īmhi ca vihite sapādino pakatibhāvoti visadda pubbe añāgamo siyā,
anya-e0806n5:12_0: Tuṁsmā icchāyanti ca pakatippaccayatthānamupadiṭṭhattā tena sabhāva liṅgena kha cha sappaccayā tadanto ca anumito na pana tuṁ,
anya-e0806n5:12_1: tumiha sutoti āha- ‘na tadanto, nāpi cha chasā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:12_2: Jighacchāiccatra dvitte pubbassa ghassa ‘‘catuttha dutiyānaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā’’ti (5-78) go.
anya-e0806n5:12_4: Pāṇinināpīha sappaccaya vidhāyake sutte vākyampi yathā siyāti vāvacanaṁ kataṁ,
anya-e0806n5:12_6: Pakatyādityatra ādi saddena atthaviseso gahetabbo, pakati viseso tumanto, icchattho-tthaviseso .
anya-e0806n5:12_7: Idaṁ lakkhaṇanti ‘‘tuṁsmā lopo cicchāyaṁ te’’iti idaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ. Niyogatoti niyamena.
anya-e0806n5:13_1: tenāsiddhena vākyenāsiddhānaṁ kha cha sānaṁ sādhanaṁ asiddhenāsiddhasādhanaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:13_3: Icchāyapavattito upaladdhīti icchāya upaladdhi upālambo parijānanaṁ pavattitoti attho.
anya-e0806n5:13_4: Cetanāvaticāti vuttaṁ tasmā cetanāvati pavattito upaladdhiṁ dassetvā tadapadese nācetanepi dassetuṁ ‘yopesā’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n5:13_5: Devadatte rajju khīlādipāṇinā uyyogo, kūle mattikāvikīraṇādi. Rajju guṇo.
anya-e0806n5:14_1: Sā sunakho mimarisatīti mara=pāṇacāge’icchāyaṁ tumantā so.
anya-e0806n5:14_3: Dvitte pubbato-ññassa lopo ‘‘kha cha sesvī’’ti (5-76) dvitte pubbassāssa imimarisati.
anya-e0806n5:14_5: Sā mimarisatīti satipi sacetanatte visattajīvitassa sunakhassa maraṇicchā sambhavatīti paṭipāditaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:16_1: Tañca nāma jāti guṇakiriyādabba sambandhato pañcadhā bhavati.
anya-e0806n5:16_2: Tattha nāmakammaṁ’ ḍittho ḍavitthoti nāmena piṇḍassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n5:16_4: Guṇakammaṁ sukkonīloti sukkādinā guṇena dabbassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n5:16_5: Kiriyākammaṁ pācako pāyakoti pācakādikiriyāya dabbassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n5:16_6: Dabbakammaṁ daṇḍīvisāṇīti daṇḍādinā dabbena piṇḍassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n5:16_7: Evaṁ kammassa pañcappakārasambhavepicchāyamatthe īyassa vidhānato icchāsambandhiyeva kammaṁ gayhatīti kiriyākammamevātra gayhate amukamevatthamupadassento āha- ‘yadipi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:17_3: ettha tva(tta)ggahaṇamantarenātta sambandhinyeva puttādo kathaṁ viññāyate visesavacanābhāve hi parasambandhinyapi pappotītīmaṁcodyamubbhāvaya māha- ‘attasambandhini’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:18_4: Yadi attano puttamicchatīti vattumicchāyaṁ sāpekkhettepi siyā,
anya-e0806n5:19_1: Uppajjamānena īyeneva attatthassābhihitattā attasaddassāppayogoti cetampi na saṅgatanti paṭipādayamāha ‘na ca sakkā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:19_3: Apūpādikāya pakatiyā samānatthasseva visesanassa vuttipade antobhāva dassanāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:19_5: ‘‘Tamassa sippaṁ sīlaṁ paṇyaṁ paharaṇaṁ payojanaṁ’’ti (4-27) ṇike āpūpiko.
anya-e0806n5:19_6: Natu bhinnatthassāti byatirekaṁ dassetvā taṁ diṭṭhantena sādhetumāha- ‘devadattassi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:19_8: Devadattassa dhuruno kulanti sāmyantarabyavacchedāya devadattasaddasso pādānato gurukulanti vuttipadena devadattatthassānto bhāvoti attho.
anya-e0806n5:19_10: Athāttano puttamicchatītyetasmiṁ vākye padassānvākhyānato attasaddassāpphayogo kinna siyāti dassetumāha- ‘nacāpi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:20_0: Padassāti puttīyādino padassa. Nacāpi appayogoti sambandho. Kāraṇamāha- ‘īyantassā’tiādi. Īyanto puttīyādi,
anya-e0806n5:20_4: Atthappakaraṇādyupalakkhaṇantyanena atthato pakaraṇāditopi puttassatta niyatā gamyate,
anya-e0806n5:21_0: Nanu ca sutte kammāti vuttattā kammasamudāyatopīyo siyā tyāsaṅkiyeva (mabhā)vaṁ sādhayamāha- ‘kammā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:21_1: Vattuṁ iṭṭhā ekasakhyā yassa kammasāmaññassa taṁ tathāvuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:21_3: Kimpanāvayavato na siyā’ mahantamputtamicchatī’ccatra puttamiccatoccāsaṅkiyāha ‘avayavatopi sāpekkhattāyevā’ti. Na bhatīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n5:21_4: Evañcarahi idampi na sijjhatīti codento āha ‘carahi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:21_5: Mahā cāyaṁ puttoceti mahāputtamicchatīti yadevaṁ karīyati tadāyampayogoti dassento āha- ‘bhavitabbameve’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:23_2: tassa sādhamyā samāna rūpatāya yampasiddhassa gavayādino sādhiyassa sādhanaṁ tamupamānantyattho.
anya-e0806n5:23_3: Samāno dhammo-sseti sadhammo, gavādiyeva. Tassa bhāvo sādhamyaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:23_4: Sādhyate upamīyate-neneti sādhanamupamānaṁ gavādi. Sādhute upamīyateti sādhiyo, gavayādi.
anya-e0806n5:24_0: Puttamivācaratīti ettha ‘āvasathamāvasati’ccādo viya ādhāratthassa viññāyamānattā putte viya māṇavake madhurannapānadānādikamācaraṇaṁ karoticcevamatthasambhavena dvinnampi upamānopameyyabhāvotyavagamayitumāha- ‘putte’iccādi.
anya-e0806n5:24_1: Pasiddhena sādhanabhāvenupamānabhūte putte ācaraṇampi pasiddhanti āha- ‘tampasiddha’nti.
anya-e0806n5:24_2: Tadācaraṇena tena ācaraṇena puttamāṇavakavisayamācaraṇaṁ vā puttamāṇavaka saddenupacārato gahetvā visayīvasena visayabhāvavohārotipi yujjati.
anya-e0806n5:24_3: Vākyattho panetasmiṁ pakkhe ‘puttamiva puttavisaya māṇavakamiva ācarati māṇavakavisayamācaraṇaṁ karotī’ti,
anya-e0806n5:25_0: Nanu ca yajjatropamānopameyyabhāvo vuttiyaṁ īyeneva jotitoti ivasaddo nivattate,
anya-e0806n5:25_2: taṁ kathamupameyyavacanassa māṇavakasaddassa vuttatthassa payogo yuttoccāsaṅkiyāha- ‘upamānavacanato’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:26_1: Upamānopameyyabhāvassānivattattāti etthāyamadhippāyo ‘upamāna visiṭṭhācaraṇe upamānavacanato īyassa vidhāne nopameyyavacanamantarenopamānavacanassa pavattīti upamānopameyyabhāvassānivattī’’ti.
anya-e0806n5:26_2: Aññathāti yadyupamānopameyyabhāvassa īyeneva jotitattā tadantassupameyye vutti siyātyattho.
anya-e0806n5:28_0: Yathānantarasutte upamāne upameyyassa māṇavakassa payogo upapanno,
anya-e0806n5:28_3: Nanu kimatthamidamuccate yavatāyo pāsāde ivācarati so pāsādamivācaratītipi vattuṁ sakkāti nātthabhedo-ññatra vacanicchābhedāti pubbenevetthāpi īyo siddho,
anya-e0806n5:30_0: Ettha kattutoiti vacanā kammāti nivattate, āyaggahaṇā īyo.
anya-e0806n5:30_2: Pabbatāyati hatthiccevamādinā hatthyādi saddena samānādhikaraṇatte satīti attho.
anya-e0806n5:32_0: Koyaṁ cyatthoccāsaṅkiya ‘‘abhūtatabbhāve karāsabhūyoge vikārācī’’ti (4-119) cīssa abhūtatabbhāve karādiyogesati vidhānā ‘abhūtatabbhāvo karādivisiṭṭho’ti āha.
anya-e0806n5:32_1: Abhūta tabbhāvassa karādivisiṭṭhattā karotyatthanivattiyāvassaṁ pāṇiniyā viya bhuviggahaṇaṁ kattabbamaññathā karotyatthepi siyātyāsaṅkiya nivattihetumāha- ‘tenevā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:32_2: Yeneva karotyādivisiṭṭho abhūtatabbhāvocyattho teneva hetunāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:32_3: Bhavatyatthe-nena kāraṇena laddhe karotyatthopyaniṭṭho labbhaticcāsaṅkiya tannivattimpaṭipādayamāha- ‘karotyatthe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:32_4: Adhavalaṁ dhavalaṁ karoti dhavalīkaroticceva cīppaccaye kattabbe kammeneva karotissābhisambandhassa diṭṭhattāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:32_6: Itisaddo hetumhi yasmā iha kattutoti vattate tatoceti attho.
anya-e0806n5:33_0: Asatyatthassa pana bhavatyattheyevāntobhāvā na tannivatti paṭipāditā.
anya-e0806n5:33_2: Dvibbacananti paṭaiccassa dvibbacanaṁ tato ‘‘dissantaññepi paccayā’’ti (4-120) rāppaccayo.
anya-e0806n5:33_4: Cyantā paccayābhāvatthaṁ- ‘acīto’ti paccayavidhānasutte paṭisedho na kato,
anya-e0806n5:34_2: Iheceti ‘cyatthe’’ itīmasmiṁyeva. Na ca vuccateti sambandho.
anya-e0806n5:36_0: Nanu ca asati sutte dutiyāggahaṇe dutiyantehiccāyaṁ viseso kuto labbhate yena ‘saddādīhi dutiyantehī’ti vivaraṇaṁ katanti saccaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:36_1: tathāpi paccayavidhimhi yuttepi pañcamiyā niddese ‘saddādīnī’ti dutiyāyopādānasāmatthiyā tathā vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ.
anya-e0806n5:37_3: Yadīpi adhīteccādīsu vattamānakālena kattunā ekavacanena ca niddeso,
anya-e0806n5:37_4: tathāpi tesamappadhānattā aññasmimpi bhūtādike kāle kammādo sādhane bahuvacanena ca paccayo siyā eveti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n5:38_0: Nanu ca ‘‘dhātvatthenāmasmī’’ti (5-12) ippaccaye patte-yamārabbhate assapi dhātvattheyeva vidhānaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:38_1: tato ca saddādīhi dhātvatthe ippaccayena na bhavitabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:38_2: dissate ca ippaccayapayogoccāsaṅkiya ‘nāyamippaccayassa bādhako’ti paṭipādetumāha- ‘dhūvaṁ karoti’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:38_4: tena bhinnavākyabhāvenāyassa ippaccayassa ca samuccayatoti attho.
anya-e0806n5:38_6: Etāni dve bhinnavākyāni- ‘dhātvatthe nāmasmā ippaccayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n5:38_7: saddādīni karoticcasmiṁ atthe āyo bhavatī’ti paccekamākhyātāpekkhāya vākyaparisamattiyā bhinnatā,
anya-e0806n5:38_8: abhinne hi kiriyāpadekavākyatā, bhinnetu nānāvākyatā, nānāvākye ca sati samuccayo.
anya-e0806n5:38_9: Na hi sāmaññavisesabhāvena vidhānameva bādhāhetu, kiñcarahi ekavākyatāpi,
anya-e0806n5:38_10: taṁ yathā-‘brāhmaṇānaṁ dadhi diyyataṁ, takkaṁ koṇḍaññāye’ti. Nānāvākye tu samuccayo,
anya-e0806n5:38_12: māḍharāya vatthayugalaṁ dīyatū’ti māḍharo brāhmaṇabhāvena bhojīyate vatthayugalañca labhate,
anya-e0806n5:38_13: tenojukaṁ vuttena vatthayugaladānena sāmaññavuttaṁ bhojanaṁ na bādhīyate,
anya-e0806n5:38_14: tathehāpi ujukaṁ vihitenāyena sāmaññavihito ippaccayo na bādhīyate lakkhiyānurodhena satthakārassa vākya bhedābhedoti nānavaṭṭhitidosoti maññate.
anya-e0806n5:39_0: Yappaccayo na vihito pāṇinīādīhi viyāti adhippāyo. ‘Jala dala- dittiyaṁ’. ‘‘Māno’’ti (5-65) māno,
anya-e0806n5:39_1: ‘‘kattari lo’’ti ‘‘parokkhāyaṁ ce’’ti (5-70) caggahaṇena ‘dala dala’itidvittaṁ ‘‘loponādibyañjanassa’’ (5-75) ‘‘saramhā dve’’ti (1-34) dassalassa ca dvibhāve daddallamānā.
anya-e0806n5:39_2: Jalamānāti aṭṭhakathāvacanatoti iminā kiriyāsamabhihāre yappaccayābhāvaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n5:39_3: Iminā ca sakkate viya bhusābhikkhaññepi kiriyāsamabhihāro kiriyāparivattanaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:39_4: tañca yadā kiriyamaññena kattabbamañño karoti, tena kattabbañcetaro, tadā bhavatīti viññeyyaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:39_5: ‘‘Sāmaññavihitā vidhayo payogamanusarantī’’ti iminā lakkhaṇena ‘dala-dittiya’nti imasmā ‘‘māno’’ti sāmaññena vihito mānappaccayo bhusatthe ābhikkhaññe ca bhavissati.
anya-e0806n5:41_1: saddaṁ karoti saddamuccāretīticcevamattho (na) gahetabbe anissayanato anabhidhānato vā.
anya-e0806n5:43_1: Kārakasādhiyoti yathālābhaṁ kārakehi sādhiyo. Asatvabhūtoti adabbabhūto.
anya-e0806n5:43_2: Ayantu kiriyārūpo padattho pacatyādīnaṁ vikledanādipadhānakiriyārūpo ca tadavayavarūpā pubbaparībhūtauddhanāro panādikādayo tādatthiyā ca pacatyādivacanīyā.
anya-e0806n5:43_3: Tasmā yathā vuttalakkhaṇe dhātvatthe dhātuto vidhīyamāno tyādippaccayo tathābhūtameva vadatīti bhedābhāvā abhedasaṅkhyāyekavacanenoccate, ‘na bahuvacanena,
anya-e0806n5:43_6: Na yatokutocītiādinā yato yattha na dissati, tato tattha na hotīti dīpeti. Yato yattha vidhi,
anya-e0806n5:43_7: sa tassa sambandhī bhavatīti nāmehi vacanīyatthato-tthantarabhūto yoyaṁ dhātvattho kamādīnamatthabhūto,
anya-e0806n5:44_1: Atha atihatthayaticcādo pādivisiṭṭhe eva dhātvatthe ippaccayassa vidhānā tadatthavihiteneva ippaccayena pādivisiṭṭho dhātvattho vutto,
anya-e0806n5:46_1: Sukhāpeticcādo sukhaṁ vedayaticcādinā viggaho. Vāpāṭhāti vikappena pāṭhato.
anya-e0806n5:48_0: Asati sutte sakattheti kathaṁ labbhatīti āha- ‘atthānati desā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:48_1: Atthā-natidesāti atthavisesassa kassaci sutte aniddesāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:48_2: Atthavisesassā-natidesamattena sakatthoyeva ṇinā vāccoti kathaṁ viññāyateccāha- ‘sakatthassa ca sutattā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:48_3: Cura=theyye iccādīsu theyyādikassa sakatthassa sutattāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:48_5: rajjaṁ kāretīti ettha sāmyamaccādikaṁ sattaṅgaṁ rajjaṁ pavattetīti vā attho, payojakabyāpāre ṇi.
anya-e0806n5:50_0: Payojako codako byāpārakoti attho nanu ca vuttiyaṁ ‘kattāraṁ payojayatī’ti vuttaṁ kathaṁ payujjamānassa kattuttaṁti āha- ‘payujjamāno’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:50_1: Nāvassaṁ kiriyāpavattakatteneva yoggatāmattenapi kattuttaṁ siyāti dassento āha- ‘kiriyāya yoggo’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:50_4: Dāsādino hīnassa katthaci atthe niyojanaṁ pesanaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:50_6: Taṁ pesanajjhesanādikaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ sabhāvo yassa so tathā vutto.
anya-e0806n5:51_2: Bhikkhā hi pacurabyañjanavatī labbhamānā vāsānukūlaṁ tittivisesamupajanayati.
anya-e0806n5:51_3: Kārīsopi nivāte padese suṭṭhu pajjalitojjhayanavirodhi sītakatamupaddavamapanayanto-jjhayanānukūlasāmatthiyamādadhāti tato tesampi yuttampayojakattanti.
anya-e0806n5:52_0: Payojakabyāpāretīdaṁ paccayavisesanaṁ vā siyā pakativisesanaṁ vā.
anya-e0806n5:52_2: tadā payojakabyāpāre vattamānā ṇīṇāpī vidhīyantīti (gamanaṁ) pati yo niyogo tadattho gami, na gatyattho,
anya-e0806n5:52_3: tassa cāyaṁ payojjoti ‘gamayati māṇavakaṁ gāma’nti gatyatthassa payojje ‘‘gatibodhāhāre’’ccādinā (2-4) vihitā dutiyā na pappoti,
anya-e0806n5:52_4: tato pakatyatthavisesanapakkho duṭṭhoti paccayavisesanapakkhaṁ dassetumāha- ‘paccayavisesanaṁ vedaṁ na pakativisesana’nti.
anya-e0806n5:53_2: Kattāraṁ yo payujjati yo ca karaṇādīnaṁ payojako tesaṁ sāmaññena gahaṇe satīti attho.
anya-e0806n5:53_3: Byāpāretvevāti payojakaggahaṇamantarena byāpāreicceva vacanaṁ kattabbaṁ siyāti bhāvo, tanti payojakaggahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:53_6: Itovāti vakkhamānassa hetuno parāmāso. Tanti curādīhi ṇividhānaṁ. Evaṁsaddo vakkhamānāpekkho.
anya-e0806n5:53_7: Taṁ visuṁ curādīhi ṇividhānameva vakkhamānappakārena saphalaṁ siyā nāññathāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:55_0: Kattari vihitesupi mānantatyādīsu parabhūtesu kyo bhavatīti viññāyeyyāti ‘bhāvakammesū’ti na kyassa visesananti āha- ‘mānantatyādīna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n5:56_3: na hi ‘ṭhīyate’ccasmā bhāvo kattā ca patīyate,
anya-e0806n5:57_1: Parasamaññābhi paresaṁ kaccāyanā naṁ parokkhāicceva nāmaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:57_3: Aparokkhesūti ettha parasamaññāvasena parokkhāiccanena saha samāsaṁ dassetvā idāni aññathāpi paṭipādetuṁ ‘athavā’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n5:57_5: Parokkhevihitā paccayāti iminā upacārena taddhitappaccayavasena vā parokkhāti saddanipphattimāha. Te pana‘a u’ iccādayo. Tatoti parokkhappaccayato.
anya-e0806n5:58_0: Nanu pubbapakkhe ‘aparokkhesū’ti ettha ‘parokkhāvajjitesū’ti attha vacanaṁ yujjati,
anya-e0806n5:58_2: tathā sati kathamettha ‘parokkhāvajjitesū’ti atthavacanaṁ yujjatīti āha- ‘tepanā’tiādi. Idhāti aparokkhesūti imasmiṁ.
anya-e0806n5:58_3: Nanu ca ‘‘parokkhe a u’’iccādisutte (6-6) ‘parokkhe’ti pakativisesananti paccayānaṁ parokkhe vihitatā kathanti manasi nidhāyāha ‘parokkhe’iccādi.
anya-e0806n5:59_1: Pubbaparībhūto padhānakiriyāvayavabhūto kiriyārūpo attho lakkhaṇaṁ sabhāvo yassa dhātvatthassa so tathā vutto.
anya-e0806n5:59_3: Bahuvacanampi hoti pākāpāketi adhippāyo, karīyatīti kammaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:59_5: tathāpi kriyatthāiccādhikārato mānādīnamaññatthālabbhanato ca kiriyā sambandhova gayhate, su-savane sūyamānaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:60_0: Pāṇiniyehettha ‘‘bhindati kusūlaṁ’tyādo yā bhedanādikiriyā kammani dissate,
anya-e0806n5:60_1: sā yadā sukarattamattena sappadhānattavacanicchāyaṁ kattuttepyupalabbhati ‘bhijjate kusulo sayameve’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n5:60_2: tadāssa kattuno suttantarena kammasarikkhabhāvo vidhīyate ‘kammanissayaṁ kāriyaṁ yathā siyā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:61_1: Atthatoti ‘kammeyeva kyo’ti (na sakkhi) tasmā vuttanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n5:61_2: Tathāhi ‘bhijjateti savanā kammatāvagamyate’ti iminā atthato kammeyevakyotipaṭipāditameva.
anya-e0806n5:61_4: Aññathāti yadi kammeyeva tepaccayo na siyā. Atoti bhijjate iccasmā.
anya-e0806n5:61_6: Kiṁ vacanenāti pāṇinīyānamiva kiṁ suttattarenāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:62_0: Vacanābhāvepi kammakattari padasaṅkhārakkamopadassanamukhena vutti ganthaṁ vivaritumāha- ‘vākyato’iccādi.
anya-e0806n5:62_1: Vākyato uddharitvā padesaṅkhariyamāneti ‘bhijjate kusūlo sayameve’ti vākyato visuṁ katvā bhijjate’ti pade saṅkhariyamāne nipphādīyamāneti attho. Tadevāti padatthasāmaññameva.
anya-e0806n5:62_5: kiñcarahi aññampatthīti dassetumāha- ‘anena ce’ccādi. Co vattabbantarasamuccaye.
anya-e0806n5:62_8: na padamudāharaṇanti kammakattuno vākyamevodāharaṇaṁ… vākyeneva tassa patītiyā maññate.
anya-e0806n5:63_0: Asmiṁ pakkheti asmiṁ kattuttena vivacchite pakkhe.
anya-e0806n5:63_2: Bhāvakammesūtīmassa kattariccassa ca paccayavisesanatthe sati sāmatthiyaladdhampayojanaṁ dassetumāha- ‘bhāvakammesū’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:63_6: Yadi bhāvakammesu kattari ca tena tena dhānena suttena mānādayo na siyuṁ,
anya-e0806n5:63_7: kathantaṁ visesitesu mānādīsu paresu kyādayo siyuntīminā sāmatthiyena ( ) (sati) bhāvakammesu kattari ( ) (ti) ca ‘‘vattamāneti anti’’ccādippabhutikehi (6-1) suttehi yathālābhaṁ bhāvādīsu paccayā hontīti viññāyatīti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n5:64_0: Natadatthaṁ vacanamāraddhanti bhāvakammesu kattari mānantatyādividhānatthaṁ pāṇiniyehi viya suttantaraṁ nāraddhanti attho.
anya-e0806n5:64_1: Atha bhāvakammesu kattari ca mānādividhānatthaṁ vacanaṁ nāraddhaṁ dhātuniyamanaṁ dhātuniyamatthaṁ tvassa vattabbanti tañca sāmatthiyāva (labbhateti) dassetumāha- ‘kiriyatthaniyamopi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:64_2: Akammakā dhātuto bhāve kattari ca sakammakā kamme kattari ceti kiriyatthaniyamo yathāvuttena sāmatthiyā labbhateti sambandho. Akammakānaṁ kammavirahā,
anya-e0806n5:64_3: sakammakānañca satopi bhāvassāppadhānattā akammakā kattari bhāve ca bhavanti na kamme,
anya-e0806n5:64_4: sakammakā kammasabbhāvā kattari kamme ca bhavanti na bhāvetīdaṁ sāmatthiyaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:65_0: Kammamapekkhateti pacādito kattari paṭhamapurisekavacane kate pacaticcādīsu pacādino pacanādikiriyā odanādikaṁ kammamapekkhate.
anya-e0806n5:69_1: Sabbattheva yattha kattari paccayo tattha vikaraṇāpi kattariyeva,
anya-e0806n5:69_2: yattha bhāvakammesu tattha vikaraṇāpi bhāvakammesuyeva,… ekāya pakatiyā kārakabhede(na) paccayassāsambhavato.
anya-e0806n5:69_3: Tasmā sahābhidhānānaṁ mānādivikaraṇānaṁ kathannāma sahāsambhavaṁ gaccheyyunti vidhīyante.
anya-e0806n5:71_0: Vivacchābhedenāti sakammakākammakavacanicchābhedena. Ubhayatthāti bhāvakammesu. Karīyatīti kattabbo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0806n5:71_2: Tabbādīnantu kesañcussaggānampi apavādavisaye pavatti hoti bahulādhikārā.
anya-e0806n5:71_4: ‘‘vadādīhiyo’’ti (5-30) apavādo taṁvisayepi tabbānīyā honti ‘gantabbo gamanīyo’ti veditabboti.
anya-e0806n5:75_0: Annatotīminā ‘bhoggamañña’ntettha aññaṁ nāma annavatā aññanti atthamāha.
anya-e0806n5:77_0: Kammakaro bharitabbatāyeccādinā kiriyāsaddattaṁ bhaccasaddassa dassento saññābhāvamapākaroti.
anya-e0806n5:78_0: Abharitabbāpiccādinā idaṁ dīpeti duvidhā saññāsaddā keci daccanta vigatāvayavatthā yathā ḍitthādayo,
anya-e0806n5:78_3: yathā satta paṇṇāni assāti sambandho pavattinimittaṁ sattapaṇṇasaddassa,
anya-e0806n5:78_5: kvacideva tvatthavisese satyasati vā tasmiṁ nimitte saddo vattatī’’ti.
anya-e0806n5:80_2: Kāmacārānuññāti kattumicchato yathiccha manujānanaṁ atisaggonāmāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:81_1: tathā ca sati vijjhatthavihi tehi eyyādīhi te bādhīyanticcāha- ‘nace’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:81_2: Vidhivisesatte pīti vidhānaṁ vidhi niyojanaṁ kiriyāsu byāpāraṇā,
anya-e0806n5:81_5: vuttañhi tena ‘‘kimatthaṁ pesādīsu kiccasaññino tabbaanīyaṇyatyappaccayā vidhīyante,
anya-e0806n5:81_6: na sāmaññena bhāvakammesu vihitā, evamete vihitāeva,
anya-e0806n5:81_7: vo-kāsikāvutti pesvādīññasvatra ca bhavissantīti visesavihitena vidhyādīsu paccayena bādhīyante,
anya-e0806n5:81_8: vāsarūpavidhinā bhavissanti evañcarahi etaṁ ñāpeti ‘itthīadhikārato parena vāsarūpavidhi nāvassambhavatī’ti kimatthamiccādi codya,
anya-e0806n5:81_9: vicasasavihiteccādi parihāro, kiccā hi sāmaññena vihitā,
anya-e0806n5:81_11: ato tena visesavihitena kiccā pesādivisaye bādhīyeranti punabbiyate,
anya-e0806n5:81_13: evaṁ carahiccādinā pesādīsu kiccavidhānassa ñāpakattaṁ dassayati. (jinindabuddhinu 21 sa).
anya-e0806n5:81_14: Asarūpavidhi asarūpāpavādappaccayo vā vikappena bādhako hoti ussaggassāti etaṁ avassaṁ na hotīti ñāpanatthampi na vidhīyateti yojanā.
anya-e0806n5:81_16: Dhātvadhikārevihito asarūpo apavādappaccayo ussaggassa bādhako bhavati itthi adhikāre vihitappaccayaṁ vajjayitvāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:82_1: Tvayā kaṭo kātabboti anuññāyaṁ. Pattakāle paramudāharaṇaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:82_2: Ettha pana kaṭakaraṇe kālārocanamattameva viññāyati, na pesādi.
anya-e0806n5:82_6: Kathaṁ sattivisiṭṭhatā kattunoti āha- ‘taṁyogā’ti. Tāya sattiyā yogo taṁyogo.
anya-e0806n5:82_7: Avassakādhamīṇatāvisiṭṭhe tu kattari kiccānaṁ tadaññesañca bhāvāya visuṁ- suttitaṁ, tena,
anya-e0806n5:82_12: Bhavaṁ arahoti pana arahakattuttappakāsanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Evamuparipi.
anya-e0806n5:84_1: Arahādīsu vihitappaccayehīti ‘‘sattyarahesveyyādī’’ (6-11) ca ‘‘sīlābhikkhaññāvassakesu ṇī’’ti (5-53) ca arahādīsu vihitappaccayehi. Upādānasīlo sikkhāpanasīlo.
anya-e0806n5:84_2: Muṇḍanaṁ dhammo sabhāvo yesaṁ te muṇḍanadhammā.
anya-e0806n5:84_3: Vadhuṁ katapariggahaṁ sāviṭṭhāyanā muṇḍayanti etesaṁ kuladhammo.
anya-e0806n5:86_1: Kiriyā visesakattuvisayāti kiriyāvisesassa yo kattā so visayo yassā sā tathā vuttā.
anya-e0806n5:86_3: Assā jīvanakiriyāya nandana kiriyāya bhavanakiriyāya vā kattā taṁkiriyaṁ sampādento bhaveyya bhavatūti attho.
anya-e0806n5:86_4: Jīvatu nandatu bhavatūti āsiṁsāyaṁ payogena jīvaka nandaka bhavakasaddānaṁ taṁsamānatthatā dassitā.
anya-e0806n5:87_0: Akenevāsiṁ sanatthassa gamitattāti āsiṁsanā eva attho,
anya-e0806n5:87_2: Nāsiṁ sanatthassa payogoti āsiṁsanā attho yassa jīvatu nandatu bhavatviccādino saddantarassa, tassa nappayogoti attho.
anya-e0806n5:91_0: Jahanti udakanti vīhīsu hāyanasaddassa pavattinimittaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n5:93_0: Nanu ca vitoti pañcamīniddiṭṭhattā ‘vito parasmā ñāiccasmā’ti vattabbaṁ kathaṁ vipubbāti vuttanti āha- ‘vito paro’iccādi. Vipubbo yassaso vipubbo.
anya-e0806n5:93_1: Visaddato dhātumhi parabhūte sati visaddo pubbo nāma hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n5:97_0: Nāmajātiguṇakiriyā dabbasambandhato pañcavidhattepi kammassa kriyatthassāvadhirayamupādinnoti kriyatthasambandhā kiriyākammasseha gahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:98_1: Nanu ca kvaciggahaṇeneva ‘ādiccaṁ passati’ccādopi (nivatti) vattuṁ sakkā kasmā ‘bahulādhikārā’ti vuttanti āha ‘tene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:98_2: Tenāti yena kvaciggahaṇaṁ kutociyevāti dassanatthaṁ kataṁ tenāti attho. Tenāti vā kvaciggahaṇena.
anya-e0806n5:98_3: Atha ādiccaṁ passaticcādo viya kammakarādīsupi nivattimadassetvā ‘kvacīti kiṁ kammakaro’ti kasmā vuttanti āha- ‘yajjeva’miccādi.
anya-e0806n5:99_3: Atheha kasmā na hoti devadatto sayati dāttena lunāti sunakhānaṁ dadāti nagarā apeti thāliyaṁ pacati mātu saratī’’ti,
anya-e0806n5:99_5: tathāpi kammatteneva yaṁ vattu micchitaṁ na kārakantarattena nāpi sambandhabhāvena,
anya-e0806n5:99_7: aññathā syāditocceva vadeyya kiṁ kammāti vacanenāti.
anya-e0806n5:101_0: Vedanti ettha atthamāha vittinti, tuṭṭhinti attho.
anya-e0806n5:103_1: Bhedena vivaraṇanti samānādīhīti avatvā bhedena vivaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:105_2: Kattādīnaṁ kiriyānimittattantu sayameva ‘tattha kattā’tiādinā bhedena pakāsayissati.
anya-e0806n5:105_3: Kiriyānimittaṁ… nibbattakesu kattādīsu chasupi ruḷhattā tenettha kattāvāttappadhāno,
anya-e0806n5:105_4: karaṇādayopyappadhānā kārakabyapadeso labbhante… aññathā kārakasaddena tesaṁ gahaṇaṁ na siyāti.
anya-e0806n5:105_9: Tesu dabbā dīsu tiṭṭhatīti tatraṭṭhā, satti. Tassā bhāvo tatraṭṭhatā, tāya.
anya-e0806n5:105_10: Atha dabbādīnaṁ mukhyato kārakatte sati kimāyātantyāha ‘yadi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:106_1: Aññamaññabyāvuttarūpattāti aññamaññato byāvuttaṁ nivattaṁ rūpaṁ karaṇādisabhāvo yesaṁ kattādi kārakānaṁ te tathā vuttā, tesaṁ bhāvo tattaṁ tasmā.
anya-e0806n5:106_2: Karaṇa rūpanti karaṇaṁ rūpaṁ sabhāvo yassa adhikaraṇassa taṁ tathā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:107_0: Evañcakatvāti nipātasamudāyo-yaṁ hetvattho. Tasmāti attho. Kattā nimittanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n5:107_2: Tadattheti tāya kammasamavāyiniyā pacanādikiriyāya atthe adhissayanādayo pavattento kiriyāya nimittanti sambandho. Evamuparipi.
anya-e0806n5:108_0: Odanaṁ pacati devadattoti kammaṭṭhakiriyāya nimittabhūtassa kattuno udāharaṇaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:109_1: Giradhātuto appaccaye- ‘‘eonama vaṇṇe’’ti (137) sutte ‘avaṇṇeti yogavibhāgato gakāre ikārassa attaṁ hotīti dassetumāha- ‘avaṇṇeti yogavibhāgā attaṁ issā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:109_4: Sakalenāti ‘eonama vaṇṇe’’ti sakalena suttena. Purīti nipāto.
anya-e0806n5:110_1: sāmaññena vidhānatoti paresaṁ visesavidhānasabbhāvamāha. Gaṇikālayaṁ gaṇikānaṁ gehaṁ. Nepathyamākappo.
anya-e0806n5:110_3: Vināliṅgavacanehi pāṭipadikatthaṁ niddisituṁ na sakkāti bhāveti sabbaliṅgasaṅkhyāsambandhayoggapāṭipadikatthasāmaññe paccayanimittattena gahitepi sāmaññe caritatthattā liṅgavacanaṁ nappadhānanti iṭṭhiāvudhantī itthi napuṁsakebhāve,
anya-e0806n5:112_0: Sapādīhi apādīhicāti pādisahitehi pādirahitehi ca dādhāhi.
anya-e0806n5:116_0: Yathādassananti ācikkhatīti yojanā. Tena kutoci dhātutoti.
anya-e0806n5:116_2: Sabhāsaiccassa antabyañjanalope sabhāpakatito ‘‘itthi yamatvā’’ti (3-26) āppaccayo. Pabhātīti ā=dittiyamiccassa.
anya-e0806n5:118_0: Calanādīnaṁ sīlādīsu nipphādanatthaṁ visuṁ suttitaṁ parehi,
anya-e0806n5:120_2: Apari paṭhitoti dhātupāṭhe aparipaṭhito. Pāṇivisesoti sattaviseso.
anya-e0806n5:121_0: Āsiṁ sāyaṁ gammamānāyaṁ saññāvisaye dhātūhi tippaccayo kiccappaccayo ca yathā siyāti ‘‘tikiccāsiṭṭhe’’ti (7-2-3) suttitaṁ kaccāyanena.
anya-e0806n5:121_1: Tamiha sāmaññena vidhānāva siddhanti nirūpayitumāha- ‘kaccāyanena pane’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:121_2: Tabba anīyaṇya teyya riccappaccayānaṁ ‘‘te kiccā’’ti (7-1-22) kiccasaññaṁ vidhāya sesānaṁ ‘‘aññekitī’’ti (7-1-23) kitsaññā katā kaccāyanena. Tenāha- ‘kita sañño’ti.
anya-e0806n5:122_1: Sakiya satthe avuttadosaṁ suttadosaṁ pariharitvā vakkhamānanayena yutyabhāvā tathā vidhāne ayuttataṁ dassento ‘nacāsiṁ sāya’miccādimāha. Guhanaṁ, rujanaṁ, modananti viggaho. Sayanaṁ vā seyyā.
anya-e0806n5:122_3: so kathaṁ yakāre parabhūte asatīti āha- ‘cavaggabayañātiyogavibhāgā vassa bo’ti.
anya-e0806n5:126_0: Atha sarūpeccetāvati vutte- ‘kiriyatthassa sarūpe’ti kathaṁ viññāyaticcāha- ‘kiriyatthā’ticcādi.
anya-e0806n5:126_1: Nanu ca lo-yaṁ kattari vidhīya mānokathamettha siyātyāha- ‘akattaripi’ccādi. Abhimato kaccāyanassa.
anya-e0806n5:126_2: Paṭipādayitumāha- ‘tatthā’tiādi. Karaṇaṁ uccāraṇaṁ, assa karoti samāsavākyaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:126_3: Na hi eva dīhi kāro vihitoti akkhare heva kārassa vihitattā akkharasamudāyato na pappotīti bhāvo. Atha ceti matappadāne.
anya-e0806n5:126_4: Evādisaddavācakā evakārādayo sādhavoti atha matanti attho.
anya-e0806n5:127_1: Niyamahetuno abhāvāti akkhareheva kārappaccayo vidheyyo na pana evādīhiccassa niyamassa yo hetu tassa hetuno abhāvā.
anya-e0806n5:129_2: Kiriyāvisayarucivisesānumitanti uṇhabhojanasaṅkhātā kiriyā visayo yassa so (kiriyā) visayo ruciviseso, tena anumitanti attho.
anya-e0806n5:129_4: Āse vā tapparatāti tamevābhikkhaññaṁ pariyāyehi phuṭīkaroti.
anya-e0806n5:130_1: Tassīlyamidaṁ hotīti iminā- ‘sīlābhikkhaññādi’’sutte sīlasaddenevābhikkhaññassa gahitattaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0806n5:131_3: Āvassakaggahaṇāyeva siddhoti vuttaṁ kathametthāvassambhāvo patīyati ccāha- ‘tañcā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:132_0: Yogavibhāgāti ‘ṇī’ti yoga vibhāgā. Sādhuṁ karoti, brahmaṁ vadati, asaddhaṁ bhuñjati,
anya-e0806n5:132_1: paṇḍitamattānaṁ maññatīti viggaho. Sādhunti kiriyāvisesanaṁ. Assaddhabhojīti vate.
anya-e0806n5:132_2: Vatañca bhojane atthitāyaṁ saddhaassaddhabhojanavisayāyaṁ pavattiyaṁ yadi bhuñjati assaddhameva bhuñjati na saddhanti satthe vuttaniyamo,
anya-e0806n5:132_3: assaddhaṁ bhuñjati evāti nottarapadāvadhāraṇaṁ… evañhi viññāyamāne yadevāssaddhaṁ na bhuñjati tadeva vatalopo siyāti atthitāya (bhojanākaṅkhitattā) yathecchaṁ sāmaññena bhojane pavattiyaṁ mattāyaṁ asaddhabhojanaṁ satthavihitamupalabhamānassa saddhato nivattitvā visese hi saddhe pavattiniyamo vatamuccate,
anya-e0806n5:132_4: niyamocātraduvidho sambhavati-asaddhaṁ bhūñjati eva, athaddhamo bhuñjatīti vā,
anya-e0806n5:132_5: tatrādime niyame yadevā saddhaṁ na bhuñjati tadevavata loposiyā (ra-3-228) kātantapañjikā.
anya-e0806n5:134_1: Kammakattarīti ubhayatthāpi kammakattari paccayo bahulādhikārāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n5:134_2: Ettha pana ekopi padattho kammañca hoti kattāca kārakasattibhedato.
anya-e0806n5:134_3: Yathā ‘pīyamānaṁ madhu madayatī’ti ekassāpi sattibhedā kammattaṁ kattuttaṁ, tathā trāpīti viññeyyaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:134_4: Yo paraṁ bhañjati tatthapi siyā sāmaññavidhānatoti āha- ‘nipātanassi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:137_2: sati ca tte bhūtasaddassa nipphattīti phuṭo yevitaretaranissayadosoti. Nesadoso,
anya-e0806n5:137_3: saṅketāti byatto saddatthasambandho cirakālappavatto, nāssa kiñci asādhuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:137_5: Ktavantā dayopi carahi saddasattisabhāvato bhūteeva bhavissantīti na vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:137_8: Bhūteti cāyaṁ pakativisesanaṁ vā siyā ‘bhūtatthe vattamānā’ti,
anya-e0806n5:137_13: Paccayatthassa kattuno anabhikkantattā ayanti payogo nopapajjateti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n5:141_0: Nanucārambheti vuttaṁ- ‘kiriyārambhe’ti kathanti āha- ‘soce’ccādi. So ca ārambho.
anya-e0806n5:141_2: Kiriyārambheti sāmaññena vuttattā kiriyatthavisesanaṁ vā etaṁsiyā paccayatthavisesanaṁ vā ubhayathāpi na dosoti dassetumāha- ‘kiriyatthavisesanaṁ ceta’ntiādi.
anya-e0806n5:141_3: Paccayatthavisesanapakkhepi sāmatthiyā ārambhe kiriyatthassāpi pavattī hotīti dassetumāha- ‘kiriyatthassāpi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:141_6: sopi sāmaññena vacanato bhāvakammesu ārambhepi hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0806n5:141_8: Bhāvakammesuceti evaṁ na vuttanti ‘yathāpattañce’ti vadatā vuttikārenevaṁ na vuttanti attho.
anya-e0806n5:142_0: Kasmā evaṁ na vuttanti āha- ‘pubbasmiṁ viyā’ti ādi.
anya-e0806n5:142_1: Aniyamuppatti saññāya sati ñāpananti tannisedhetumāha- ‘punabbacanato’tiādi. Māsaṅkīti kammani, tenevuppattīti paṭhamā.
anya-e0806n5:142_2: Evaṁ maññate ‘‘bhāvakamma gahaṇaṁ cākārenānukaḍḍhiya ‘bhāvakammesu cā’tyanena ktevidhīya māne idamāsaṅkīyate ‘pubbeneva sāmaññena siddhe punabbacanā punabbacanaṁ kiriyatthāniyamena ttassuppattī’ti,
anya-e0806n5:142_3: yathāpattañceti hyuccamāne cakārena yathāpattampi kāriyamanuññāyateti pubbeneva vacanena bhāvakammesvārambhepi yathāpatto kto bhavatīti viññāyate’’ti.
anya-e0806n5:142_4: Evañcarahi bhāvakammesvārambhepi pubbeneva siddhattā ‘‘kattariārambhe’’icceva vucceyya kiṁ cakārene ccāsaṅkiyāha- ‘padānamavadhāraṇa phalattā’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:143_1: bahūhi kiriyākkhaṇehi kaṭe parisamatteyeva bhūto kālo ca bhavatīti kiriyāphalassāparinipphannattā vattamānova kāloti tatrakto na pappoticcāsaṅkiyāha- ‘kiriyāphalassi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:143_2: Kaṭekadesassāpi kaṭattā tassa ca nibbattattā bhūtavacanicchāti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n5:143_5: na ca tadavatthā te eva kaṭoti kathaṁ ‘pakato kaṭo’ti bhūtakālena pakatasaddena kaṭasaddasamānādhikaraṇattamiccāha- ‘ādibhūtene’ccādi. Tattha tasmiṁ visese. Pakattuṁ ārabhi, pakattuṁ ārabhīyittha, pasottuṁ ārabhi,
anya-e0806n5:145_2: Sakammakatthanti vatvā sakammattamesaṁ pādiyoge sati hotīti dassetumāha- ‘pādisahitā’ccādi. Khaṭopikā mañco.
anya-e0806n5:147_0: Avivacchitakammo cehākammakoti kathayamāha- ‘avijjamāne’ccādi. Yātavanto yātā, yānaṁ yātaṁ. Ayoyitthāti yā to.
anya-e0806n5:147_3: Sā ca bhūtā yevātīminā kāraṇasāmaggiyā atītakālikattamāha.
anya-e0806n5:149_0: Ādhāreceti anuvuttiyā ettha cakārato ‘yathāpattañce’ti sambandhā vuttanti seso.
anya-e0806n5:149_1: Evaṁ na kutoci apakassanaṁ siyāti evamādhārādike anuvattamāne sati kutoci ādhārādito apakassanaṁ visuṁ karaṇaṁ na siyāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:149_2: Tathā sati heṭṭhā suttenekayogameva kareyyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n5:150_0: Bahulassa bhāvo kammaṁvāti bahvatthādānamevātra bahulasaddassa pavattinimittaṁ bhāvo kammaṁceti tattha paccayo.
anya-e0806n5:151_0: Nā . Bhijjamānanti paccamānaṁ. Pararūpena passinnoti yojanā. Keciti teyeva.
anya-e0806n5:151_2: Akkocchi tanti kamme viggahamāha, tanti kammapadaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:151_3: evamuparipi curādiṇilope ‘‘nimittābhāve nemittikassāpyabhāvo’’tyākāranivatti. Kasirayaṁ gatyādyane kattho,
anya-e0806n5:152_1: Kaṭṭhasaddassa phalahetubhūte agyādike vattamāne evaṁ hotu phalevattamāne kathanti āha- ‘yadāpanā’tiādi. Kodhātiko idha.
anya-e0806n5:154_0: Nanu ca bhāveiti bhavatināyaṁ ghaṇantena niddeso karīyatīti bhavativisayova paccayatthaniddeso kato bhavati,
anya-e0806n5:154_1: tato ca bhavatino yo bhāvo tasmiṁyeva vācce paccayo siyā,
anya-e0806n5:154_2: so ca bhavatito yevuppajjamānena paccayena sakkābhidhātuṁ tato tasmāva paccayena bhavitabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:154_3: tasmā kathaṁ pacituṁ pāko cāgo rāgotipacādīhibhavati ccāha- ‘bhavanaṁbhāvo kiriyādhātvattho’ti.
anya-e0806n5:155_1: tena kiriyāsāmaññavācinātthaniddeso karīyamāno sabbadhātuvisaye kato bhavati tasmā pacādīhipi bhavatītyadhippāyo.
anya-e0806n5:156_0: Nanu cātra tumādayo bhāve bhavantīti vutte na viññāyate kiṁvisesite bhāve tumādayo bhavanticcāha- ‘yato’ccādi. Tassāti dhātuno.
anya-e0806n5:156_1: Yo vattabbo bhāvoti yo vācco bhāvo. Kutoccāha- ‘sambandhā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:156_2: Tumādīnaṁ yā pakati tāya vācceneva bhāvena saha sambandhāti attho. Ṭhātabbanti bhāve tabbo.
anya-e0806n5:156_3: Atha kriyāyaṁtyanena tabbādyabhihitassa dabbarūpāpannassa bhāvassa kathaṁ gahaṇaṁtyāha- ‘yadipi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:156_4: Sakanissayakiriyābyapadesoti dabba rūpassa attano nissayabhūtāya kiriyāya byapadeso daṭṭhuṁ cakkhuccādo bhavanakiriyāya patīyamānattā tumādayo bhavanteva.
anya-e0806n5:157_0: Nanu ca tumādīnaṁ bhāve vihitattā kiriyāyeva padhānattanti kamma kārakaṁ nappatīyateti kathaṁ ‘kaṭaṁ kātuṁ gacchatī’ti siyāccā saṅkiya paṭipādetumāha- ‘yadipi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:157_2: Atthīti iminā yattha ‘supyate deva dattene’ccādo natthi,
anya-e0806n5:158_0: ‘‘Icchatthesu samānakattukesu tavetuṁ vā’’ti (4-2-12) kaccānena atadatthāyampikiriyāyaṁ tumādayo yathāsiyunti visuṁ suttitaṁ, tenāha- ‘icchatthesmi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:158_1: Yathā ‘bhottuṁ pacatī’tyādo bhojanakiriyā payojanā pacanakiriyā hoti,
anya-e0806n5:158_2: nevamettha tappa yojanā icchā… pacanakiriyāyaviyatappayojanattābhāvatoti ayamassādhippāyo.
anya-e0806n5:159_0: Icchatthassa dhātuno payogāti iminā ‘icchanto karotī’ti ettha icchantoti icchatthassa dhātuno payogatthameva,
anya-e0806n5:159_2: Devadattaṁ bhuñjamānamicchatītettha bhottunti na hoti samānakattukesūti vacanato, bhojanassa devadatto kattā,
anya-e0806n5:159_3: icchatissa aññoyevātipi suttassa visuṁ payojanaṁ na vattabbanti dassento āha- ‘devadatta’miccādi.
anya-e0806n5:160_1: Sādhanaṁ ‘devadattaṁ bhuñjamāna’nti vuttakammasaṅkhātaṁ attho payojanaṁ yassa so sādhanattho-icchati. Tassa bhāvo tattaṁ, tasmā.
anya-e0806n5:160_3: Niratthakanti etadatthameva samānakattukaggahaṇaṁ kataṁ tañca yathāvuttena pasaṅgābhāvā niratthakanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n5:161_0: Sakādyatthesu dhātū sūpapadesu dhātu mattā tumādayo suttantarena vihitā pāṇiniyehi,
anya-e0806n5:161_2: Bhujikiriyatthāti bhujikiriyā attho yassā sattiyā sā bhujikiriyatthā patīyate.
anya-e0806n5:161_6: Paresamayamadhippāyo ‘‘sakkoti bhottuṁtyādo kosalyaṁ gamyate. Gilāyati bhottuṁti tadasatti. Ghaṭate bhottuṁtyādo yogyatā.
anya-e0806n5:161_11: Sakkoticcādino upapadassa bhojanādikiriyatthatā na gamyate tasmā akiriyatthesupi sakādīsūpapadesu tumādayo bhavantī’’ti.
anya-e0806n5:162_0: Patīyamānesvapyetesvatthantaresu tādatthiyamatthiyevāti pubbena vihitassa tumādinotra na bādheti dassetumāha- ‘yadipi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:162_1: Tādatthiyamatthiyevāti bhojanakiriyatthatā sakkotiādīnaṁ atthi yevāti attho siddhāyeva ‘‘tuṁtāye’’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n5:162_2: Alamatthavisiṭṭhesu pariyattivacanesūpapadesu dhātuto tumādayo vihitā parehi,
anya-e0806n5:162_6: Abhimatāti kaccāyanena ‘‘arahasakkādīsu ce’’ti (4-2-13) casaddena abhimatā imassāti ‘kālo bhottuṁ’tiādino.
anya-e0806n5:162_7: Yathā bhottumanotiādinā paresampi ayameva nipphattikkamoti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n5:162_9: bhavati bhojanaṁ bhāvoti bhojanaṁ bhuñjanaṁ bhāvo bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0806n5:162_10: Natugamissakiriyātadatthāti gamanakiriyā bhojanatthā na hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n5:162_11: Atthasaddohyayaṁ payojanavacano yañca yamuddissa pavattati, taṁ tassa payojanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0806n5:163_2: ‘Kattariltu’ccādinā yoyaṁ ṇako tīsupi kālesu sāmaññena vihito,
anya-e0806n5:163_3: kriyatthā yaṁ kriyāyaṁ upapade kattuno-bhidhānaṁ siddhaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:163_4: na cāssa visesavihitena tuṁpaccayena bādhā bhinnattā,
anya-e0806n5:163_5: tuṁpaccayassa hi bhāve vidhānaṁ ṇakassa tu kattarīti.
anya-e0806n5:163_9: Hi yasmātyatthe yo eso vajati so kattā,
anya-e0806n5:163_10: yo eso vajati so vikkhipotyayamattho-tra gamyate,
anya-e0806n5:163_11: na pana tehi tādatthiyaṁ gamyateti attho.
anya-e0806n5:163_12: Codako ltvādīhi sāmyamāpādayituṁ sāmarisaṁ vuttavidhinevāppattiṁ ṇakassāpyāha- ‘ṇakopi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:163_13: Agatthaṁ apakatatthaṁ (potthake) yadipi ṇakena tādatthiyaṁ na gamyate pakaraṇato gamyateti ṇako bhavissatītyāsaṅkiya codako āha- ‘athe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:163_14: Pubbeccādinā vutto-yaṁ ‘ṇako na vidheyyo’ccassa na parihāro… sottarattā yathāvuttena,
anya-e0806n5:163_16: Tadevaṁltvādīnampipattitoṇakaltvādīhi tādatthiyānavagame vinicchite tādatthiyavisesena tesaṁ sambhavoti anatthakaṁ ‘‘ṇakassa kiriyatthopapadassavidhānaṁ ltvādipaṭisedhanattha’’nti vākyakāravacananti satthakāro nigamayamāha- ‘tasmā’’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:163_19: Bhavissati kāle kriyatthāyaṁ kriyāyamupapade bhāve ca ṇappaccayādayo vihitā,
anya-e0806n5:165_0: Sotunādīsu ‘savanaṁ kātuna’iccādinā viggaho. Suteneti savananti viggaho.
anya-e0806n5:167_4: Yadipi ‘pubbaṁ byāpāra’nti samudāye ekadesabhūto byāpāro niddhāriyamānoti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:167_5: tathāpi pubbasaddena byāpāravācako kriyattho vuccate upacārā,
anya-e0806n5:167_6: teneva ‘tesu yo pubbo tadatthato kriyatthā’ti vuttiyaṁvuttaṁ. Nanu ca satti kārakaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:167_7: aññā ca pubbakālakiriyāya satti, aññā uttara kālakiriyāya,
anya-e0806n5:167_11: Eka kattukānaṁ byāpārānaṁ kamābhidhānāya tunādayo vidhīyamānā bhāveyevuppannā sakkonti kamamabhidhātunti bhāvetyatrābhisambajjhate.
anya-e0806n5:168_2: Pāṇini yānamiva visuṁ vacanamantarena tunādividhippaṭipādayamāha- ‘mukhaṁ byādāya supati’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:168_3: Byādāyāti dādhātussa viāpubbassa tvāppaccaye ‘‘pyo vā tvāssa samāse’’ti (5-064) tvāssa pyādese rūpaṁ, mukhavivaraṇaṁ katvātyattho,
anya-e0806n5:169_1: parāya nadiyā pabbato-varo visesī yateti appatvā nadimpabbato’ti vutte nadiyā orabhāge pabbatoti attho. Bhavati,
anya-e0806n5:169_3: Avarena pabbatena parā nadī visesīyateti atikkamma pabbataṁ nadīti vutte pāre nadiyā ore pabbatoti attho patīyate,
anya-e0806n5:169_4: tato ca orabhāge pabbatavisiṭṭhā nadī viññāyate.
anya-e0806n5:169_5: Bhavatino sabbattha sambhave sati ekakattukatā pubbakālatā yathā gamya te tathā dasseti ‘paṭhamaṁ na pappoti’ccādi. Nigamayati ‘tadeva’miccādinā.
anya-e0806n5:170_0: Bhutvā bhutvā gacchatīti pare-ññathā nipphattimākaṅkhanti pāṇiniyādayo,
anya-e0806n5:170_7: Kiṁ ṇampaccayenāti idaṁ vuttaṁ hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n5:170_9: Kiṁ visiṭṭhanti pucchitvā jīvaggāhena visiṭṭhanti dassetuṁ jīvaggāha’nti āha.
anya-e0806n5:171_0: Ākhyātanti agāhayīti ākhyātaṁ kattabbarūpanti imānā gahaṇa kiriyāya kammattaṁ bodheti.
anya-e0806n5:171_3: Tathā ceti kiriyāvisesane dutiyāya ṇamante jāte sati.
anya-e0806n5:171_4: Ṇamanta rūpanti ṇamantassa rūpaṁ yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n5:171_5: Ṇaṁpaccayeniha kiñcineti sambandho. Iheti imasmiṁ byākaraṇe. Kiñci payojanaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:173_0: Yo sādhayitumāraddho naca niṭṭhamupagatoti yo kaṭādisādhayituṁ nibbattayituṁ āraddho niṭṭhaṁ parisamattiṁ na copagato nappatto.
anya-e0806n5:173_1: Pavatto-nuparatovāti yo pabbatādi niccappavato-avirato teneva niṭṭhaṁ nopagatosovattamānoti vuccateti yojanā.
anya-e0806n5:173_3: idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti ‘‘yathāvuttakaṭādīnaṁ vattamānattā tabbisayā kiriyāpi vattamānā evāti taṁdvārena kriyatthavisesana’’nti.
anya-e0806n5:174_0: Bhuñjati devadattoti ettha yajjapi bhuñjamāno hasati khajjati vadati pāniyaṁ pivati,
anya-e0806n5:174_1: tathāpi yuttā vattamānatā kattumicchitassārambho na parisamattoti vuttaṁ- ‘sādhayitumāraddho na ca niṭṭhamupagato’ti.
anya-e0806n5:174_2: Tiṭṭhanti pabbatātiādīsu niccesu pabbatādīsu bhūtānāgatānamasambhavā tannisedhino vattamānassāpyasambhavā yadīpi kālavibhāgo na viññāyate,
anya-e0806n5:174_3: tathāpi āraddhassa ṭhānassāparisamattiyā vattamānā evāti vuttaṁ- ‘pavatto-nuparato vā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:175_0: Idha pana sāmaññena vihitattā āha- ‘sāmaññenā’tiādi. Santo ‘asa-bhuvi’ntappaccayo.
anya-e0806n5:175_1: ‘‘Kattari lo’’ (5-18) ‘‘ntamānānti yiyuṁsvādilopo’’ti (5-130) akārassa lopo. Tapanto ‘tapa-santāpe’. Jappanto ‘jappa=vacane’.
anya-e0806n5:175_4: Dissanto disa dusa=appitiyaṁ’’ divādīhi yaka’’ (5-12) yajanto ‘yaja-devapūjāyaṁ’. Arahanto ‘araha-pūjāyaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:175_5: Yathācātiādinā apaṭhamāsamānādhikaraṇādīsu ‘saṁvijjamāno virocamānaṁ jappamāno’ccādīsu māno nto viya daṭṭhabboti vadati.
anya-e0806n5:177_2: Yujjhamānā’yudha=sampahāre’ ‘‘divādīhi yaka’’ (5-12) ‘‘tavaggavaraṇāna’’miccādinā (1-48) dhassa jho’’vaggalasehi te’’ti (1-49) yassa ca.
anya-e0806n5:181_1: Katipayadhātvādipariggahenāti dhātavo pakatibhūtā ādī yeyaṁ kālādīnaṁ te dhā tvādayo tesaṁ pariggahenāti attho. Kālo vattamānādi,
anya-e0806n5:181_2: kārakaṁ kattādi pakaṁsena niyamena paccayo karīyate etasmāti pakati. Kākriyaṁ āyukādi.
anya-e0806n5:182_1: Tacchakādayo (tacchakakamma) kāratantavāyarajakanahāpitā pañca kāravo cārudāruti vattamāne kālaniyamenāññatrāpi bhavissati. Evaṁ kāruādīsupi.
anya-e0806n5:184_1: nanu sutte ekassaroti pulliṅgena niddeso, ādīti ca tabbisesanaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:184_2: evaṁ sati napuṁsakena vivaraṇaṁ kathaṁ yujjatīti āha- ‘sadde’ccādi,
anya-e0806n5:184_3: atha jāgareccādo puthagavayavekassarassa jāgarasaddassa ca paccekaṁ kasmā na dvibhāvoccāha- ‘teneve’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:185_1: Avayavekassarassāti visesanasamāso ‘avayavo ca so ekassaro ce’ti.
anya-e0806n5:186_2: Tathā sati ko dosoti āha- ‘eko ce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:187_0: Nanu ca pacatimhi yenevākārena pacasaddo ekassaro teneva tadavayavāpi acsaddo pasaddo ca ekassaro,
anya-e0806n5:187_1: tatovāvayavānampi paccekaṁ dvibbacanaṁ pappoti… dvibbacanakāriyino ādissa ekassarassa sāmaññena niddesā,
anya-e0806n5:187_2: evañca samudāyassa tadavayavānañcekassarānaṁ visuṁ dvibbacane kate aniṭṭhampappotītīdamapākattumāha- ‘sakiṁsatthappavattiyā sāvayavassa samudāyassa gahaṇa’nti.
anya-e0806n5:187_3: Sakiṁ satthappavattiyā ekavāraṁ dvibbacanasuttassa pavattiyā dvibbacanakaraṇenāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0806n5:188_0: Sāvayavassāti yathāvuttāvayavehi saha vattamānassa na vinā tehi.
anya-e0806n5:188_1: Evaṁ maññate ‘‘yassa dvibbacane karīyamāne sabbesamavayavānaṁ gahaṇaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0806n5:188_3: tesañhi dvibbacane ekāya dvibbacanassuppattiyā na sabbesaṁ gahaṇaṁ kataṁ hoti nāvayavantassa samudāyassa ca katanti puna tesaṁ dvibbacanāya satthappavattiyā bhavitabba’’nti.
anya-e0806n5:188_5: Iha ṭhāne dvibbacanaṁ dvippayogo dvibbacananti dve pakkhā.
anya-e0806n5:188_6: Tatra ṭhāne dvibbacanapakkhe dosadassanato dvippayogo dvibbacanantyayameva pakkhobbhupagatoti dassento paṭhamantāva ṭhāne dvibbacanapakkhe bhāvinaṁ dosamāha- ‘paṭhamassekassarassi’ccādi. Dvisaddo saṅkhyeyye vattate.
anya-e0806n5:189_1: tattha uccāraṇe saṅkhyeyye ṭhāne dvibbacanaṁ na sambhavati… uccāraṇassa saddā(nugata) dhammattā.
anya-e0806n5:189_2: Saddarūpe saṅkhyeyye ṭhāne dvibbacanaṁ, tattha tañca (potthake) doso.
anya-e0806n5:189_4: Tathā sati nivuttidhamme ṭhānī bhavatīti ṭhānino nivuttiyā bhavitabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:189_7: Tena ppaccaye pare pakatiyā vidhīyamānaṁ kāriyaṁ na siyā,
anya-e0806n5:189_8: tena vuttaṁ- ‘assa ittaṁ na siyā’ti. Pipāsati ‘pā=pāne’.
anya-e0806n5:189_12: Dvippayoge tu dvibbacane nāyaṁ doso samāvisatīti āha- ‘āvuttiyaṁ ti’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:189_13: Dvidhā bhūtassā tidhinā dhātusseva dvidhābhūtattaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0806n5:191_1: Yadi hyatrāpi chaṭṭhī abhimatā siyā tadā ‘‘kha cha sa parokkhānamekassarodidve’’ti ekameva yogaṁ kareyya.
anya-e0806n5:191_3: nāññatoti parokkhāvacanasannidhānā casaddena dhātuvihitappaccayāva gayhantīti āha- ‘aññasmimpi dhātuvihitappaccaye’ti.
anya-e0806n5:191_4: Yadi pana bhusattho ābhikkhaññattho vā vattumiṭṭho siyā,
anya-e0806n5:191_5: tadā bhūsatthādīsu ca daddallaticcādikaṁ hotīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:191_6: Caṅkamati momūhacittānīti bhusatthassa yujjamānattā tyādayo bhusatthe bhavanti bahulādhikārāti vattuṁ sakkāti.
anya-e0806n5:193_1: Tattha ‘‘khachasānamekassarodi dve’’ (5-69) ‘‘parokkhāyaṁ ce’’ti (5-70) paṭhamassekassa rassa dvibbacanaṁ ‘ādismā sarā’’ti tu dutiyassa,
anya-e0806n5:193_2: tasmā kathamaññassuccamāneaññassabādhakaṁsiyā tasmā katepidutiya dvibbacanepaṭhamadvibbacanaṁ sambhavatvevātinapaṭhamadvibbacanāpavādo-yaṁ yogoccāsaṅkiyāha- ‘paṭhame’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:193_3: Kriyatthādhikārā kriyatthānanti chaṭṭhiyā dutiyenekassa renaca sambandhā paṭhamadvibbacanassavidhāya kamaññavākyamaññaṁ dutiyassāti na vākyabhedoti āha- ‘eke’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:193_6: ‘‘Ādismā sarā’’ti saramadvittenupādāya sāmaññena saddarūpassa dvibbacanavidhānato pubbe viya byañjanayuttasseva vidhānaṁ tatheviṭṭhatthattāti paṭhamadvibbacana sambandhino byañjanassa dvibbacanabādhātyavagantabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:195_0: Paṭinimittanti nimittaṁ nimittaṁ pati paṭinimittaṁ, nimitte satīti attho.
anya-e0806n5:197_2: Paṭhama dutiya tatiya dvibbacananti ettha puiti paṭhamaṁ saddarūpaṁ, ttiiti dutiyaṁ, yisiti tatiyaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:201_0: Catthaparattāti catthasamāsā parabhūtattā. Tena paccekāti sambandhena.
anya-e0806n5:201_2: Ācariyena yovibhattilopeneva niddiṭṭhattā āha- ‘luttayovibhattiko vā niddeso’ti.
anya-e0806n5:203_1: Kānubandhakaraṇamanatthakaṁ siyāti ghakvikaraṇassa paccayattābhāve (taṁ) nibandhanassa kāriyassābhāvā ‘na te kānubandhanāgamesū’’ti (5-85) paṭisedhā bhāvoti kakārānubandhamanatthakaṁ siyā.
anya-e0806n5:205_5: na paccayoti kathampaccaye ‘‘lahussupantassā’’ti (5-83) eo papponti kathañce sampaṭisedhoccāsaṅkiyāha- ‘ñisse’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:205_6: Nanucādimhi na yuvaṇṇābhi kathametthappasaṅgoti āha- ‘sakāpānaṁ kukkūṇeti’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:206_1: Yuvaṇṇeccādināpattassāti (tabba) tuṁ paccayesu ca ṇino pattassa. Vā vidhānā na ñi.
anya-e0806n5:206_3: Dhunāpetīti pāṭhetimhi le ca ‘‘kvaci vikaraṇāna’’nti (5-161) vikaraṇalope ca ekāro.
anya-e0806n5:206_4: Asati nāgame ‘‘yuvaṇṇe’’ccādinā ettaṁ siyā tampināgame upantattā netyadhippāyenāha- ‘tathāpi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:208_0: Sama dama-upasame. Sametīti samako, dametīti damako, jana-janane,
anya-e0806n5:210_0: Nipajjati nipajjanaṁ. Pamajjate pamajjitabbaṁ. Pamajjanāya pamajjituṁ. Pamajjati pamajjanaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:214_1: ‘‘chaṭṭhiyantassā’’ti (1-17) antasseva lopo siyāti codanaṁ manasi nidhāya taggahaṇe payojanaṁ dassento āha- ‘antaggahaṇa’miccādi.
anya-e0806n5:214_4: Bhadantavidhicaritattabyāpāraṁ tadantavidhicirabhedanāccanabyāpāraṁ (potthake) nissāyāha- ‘chaṭṭhiyantassā’’tī byāpārā’ti. Antassāti vīādīnamīkārādino.
anya-e0806n5:214_7: Idāni chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhānaṁ visesena vattumicchittaṁ antasseva lopapattidosaṁ dassetumāha- ‘tadante’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:216_1: Anantarasutte ‘‘paripaccasamo hī’’ti vuttattā tato parassāti kinnāvasīyatīti codana mubbhāviya tadayuttataṁ dassetumāha- ‘nanuce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:222_0: ‘‘Vaṇṇe yantaṁ tadādo’’ti paribhāsāya ayamattho ‘‘vaṇṇe pare yaṁ kāriyaṁ taṁ tadādo tasmiṁ vaṇṇe ādibhūte hotī’’ti teti takāre pare.
anya-e0806n5:232_0: Vatta=vattanetīmasmā ttippaccaye vā ukāro na vihitoti āsayena ‘katha’miccādi vuttanti dassento āha- ‘vattavattaneti’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:232_2: Ṭhā=gatinivattiyanti ettha ‘gatinivattiya’nti nipātanā pakkhe ukāro na hoti, tenāha- ‘vattī’tiādi. Vattanaṁ vutti vatti.
anya-e0806n5:244_0: Nāññatracayādīsūti nicchayato-ññesu aññasmiṁ cayādīsvatthesu cho na bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0806n5:246_0: Īmhi jasadde akārassa lopo, le tu jīrāpayati. Tassātikyassa.
anya-e0806n5:252_0: Dassātyananuvattamānepi dasseva pappoti vacanabalenāti dassetuṁ pakkhantaramāha- ‘ādissā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:252_1: Anaghaṇsu paresu āparīhi dassāniyamena ḷoccāsaṅkiya nevaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:254_0: Vuttiyaṁ etasmiṁ visayeti ettha etasminti tyādintavajjitapaccaya visayeti attho.
anya-e0806n5:254_2: Na ñāpakatoti iminā idaṁ dasseti ‘‘kiñci vacanānusārato viññāyamānatāmattena ñāpīyate kiñci ñāpakena,
anya-e0806n5:254_3: asmimpakkhe vuttānusārato katthaci kassaci dhātuno appayogo viññāpīyatī’’ti.
anya-e0806n5:254_5: Asassāppayogoti asadhātussa kismiñci tabbādike paccaye pare bhavitabbantiādīnamappayogoti attho.
anya-e0806n5:255_1: Evaṁ maññate ‘‘asassa bhūādesena sādhīyamānaṁ sabbamiṭṭhaṁ bahulādhikārato bhūdhātunāva sijjhati vināpi bhūādesasuttantaranti katthaci kassaci appayogassa ñāpakattampissa yujjati aññattha karīyamānamihāpi atthavantaṁ siyā’’ti.
anya-e0806n5:256_4: Adissāti ‘ada-bhakkhaṇe’iccassa. Īādīti bhūte īādi. Etissa ca īādīsūti sambandho.
anya-e0806n5:257_0: Avabodhe etissa ṇisesu ca īādīsu ca,
anya-e0806n5:257_1: ajjhene etissa parokkhāsu ca ṇisesu ca īādīsucāti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:261_0: Pubbasaralope rūpassa samānattā antinā antu ca gahitoti ‘santi santū’ti udāharaṇadvayaṁ dassitaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:263_1: Anvayabyatirekehi kiriyā yadipi dhātunāva vuccatīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n5:263_2: Kiṁ visiṭṭhā kiriye ccāha- ‘sāmaññabhūtā visiṭṭhā vā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:263_3: So visesoti yena visesena visiṭṭhā kiriyā dhātunāva vuccati so viseso.
anya-e0806n5:263_4: Vācaka bhedatoti sāmaññāya ca kiriyāya visiṭṭhāya ca vācakānaṁ dhātūnaṁ bhedato tenāpīti kaccānenāpi. Saṇṭhānaṁ saṇṭhiti.
anya-e0806n5:269_0: Anusāsīyitthāti anusiṭṭho kamme kto ‘‘sā sassa sisvā’’ (5-117) sāsanāya sāsituṁ.
anya-e0806n5:271_0: Atha bahassāti ḍhādesasambandhe chaṭṭhī kasmā na viññāyateti āha- ‘bahassā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:271_1: Ḍhayogapajjenāti ḍhakārena saha yogapajjena ekībhāvenāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:273_0: Ḷocāti vuttattāti evaṁ maññate ‘‘yadāyaṁ paccayādeso siyā tadā ete samāsene-kato niddiseyyā’’ti, tenāha- ‘haḷāti vadeyyā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:277_1: Pinayīti thūlo ahosīti attho sūyīti itisaddo ādyattho,
anya-e0806n5:277_2: tena adīyi aḍīyi alīyi alūyītime saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0806n5:281_0: Akirī, akirīyitthāti vā kiṇṇo, akirīti kiṇṇavā. Apurī purīyitthāti puṇṇo, apurīti puṇṇavā. Akhiyīti khīṇo khīṇavā.
anya-e0806n5:283_0: Atarī, ajīrīti kamena viggaho. Cīyitthāti ciṇṇo, cinīti ciṇṇavā.
anya-e0806n5:295_2: Tathāhi visesanaṁ kevalayakārato visuṁ karaṇaṁ attho yassāti añña padatthe sati kevalayakārassa nivattanaṁ viññāyate.
anya-e0806n5:295_3: Yakāramatte gahite ko dosoti āha- ‘yo vā tvāssa samāsetihī’tiādi. Patvāti ‘pata patha=gamane, pada=gamane’iccassa vā.
anya-e0806n5:299_1: Ñāpakālopoti ‘‘titālīsā’’ti (1-1) ñāpakatoyeva ktvāppaccayassa yo vakāro tassa lopoti attho.
anya-e0806n5:301_0: Nanu nassāti vutte paccayanakārassāti kathaṁ viññāyatīti āha- ‘nassā’tiādi,ntamānatyādīnaṁ paccayānaṁ nassa ‘‘nantamānatyādīna’’nti (5-172) ṇattapaṭisedhā viññāyati pakaraṇatoti pakāroti (potthake) āha- ‘paccayanakārovā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:303_0: Icchīyateti icchitabbaṁ. Esanaṁ icchā. Icchīyitthāti icchitaṁ, āsanamāsitabbaṁ. Āsanāya acchituṁ.
anya-e0806n5:305_2: Kasmā ntapubbachakkesu kuru ādesena nodāhaṭanti āha- ‘vavatthite’ccādi.
